data.name: Pickle Frickle
data.detailed_description:
Pickle Frickle is a platforming game about the adventure of a pickle to become the president. Travel through different environments, finally ending up in the White House. What happens there depends on your actions throughout the game.

Key Features


  • Up to four players in local multiplayer
  • Over 5 levels to play and explore, with more to come.
  • Unlockable characters to play as, some with unique playstyles
  • Hats
  • Minigames to be played in the arcade
data.about_the_game:
Pickle Frickle is a platforming game about the adventure of a pickle to become the president. Travel through different environments, finally ending up in the White House. What happens there depends on your actions throughout the game.

Key Features


  • Up to four players in local multiplayer
  • Over 5 levels to play and explore, with more to come.
  • Unlockable characters to play as, some with unique playstyles
  • Hats
  • Minigames to be played in the arcade
data.short_description: You are but a pickle, determined to become the first non-human president of the United States of America. You stop at nothing to achieve this goal.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Has not been thoroughly tested on older hardware. It may run, but not well, on similar hardware to the minimum requirements.
